Honestly, the alternate builds in this set are pretty lazy as they all use different bases each leaving 1 base unused. I love the design of the house exterior and interior. I also had lots of fun rearranging
I also like the parts included in this set like the many transparent pillars (7x) and doors (2x) and many others

Overall, even at RRP, this set is worth picking up if you can still find it
